TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DomainCollisionOptions extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies additional information about a forest trust collision when the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustRelationshipCollision.CollisionType%2A> property value is <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustCollisionType>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainCollisionOptions NetBiosNameDisabledByAdmin = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The forest trust NetBIOS record was disabled by administrative action.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainCollisionOptions NetBiosNameDisabledByConflict = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The forest trust NetBIOS record was disabled due to a conflict with an existing NetBIOS record.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainCollisionOptions None = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainCollisionOptions SidDisabledByAdmin = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The forest trust SID was disabled by administrative action.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainCollisionOptions SidDisabledByConflict = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The forest trust SID was disabled due to a conflict with an existing SID.
